sentences.english: The system of National loan aid to the university students is perfect in US .

sentences.english: Many needy students in the school have gotten student loan.
sentences.chinese: 大多数贫困生都领到了贷学金。

sentences.english: The direction in which graduates will go is to be regulated by the system of scholarship and loan in our country.
sentences.chinese: 国家通过实行奖学金和贷学金制度来调节毕业生流向。
